title: Mimi's smoked salmon chowder
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '175g chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '60g chopped celery', '60g plain flour', '1.4L chicken or vegetable stock', '500g potatoes - peeled and cubed', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '225g smoked salmon, cut into 1cm pieces', '60ml white wine', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon hot sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '125ml milk', '125ml double cream']
